author: Staff Reporter
text:
The K.G. Chavadi police arrested the driver and owner of a lorry for allegedly smuggling sand from Karur to Kerala. The vehicle was intercepted and checked near the Walayar Check Post when the police found 21 tonnes of sand, packed in 420 bags (weighing 50 kg each).

Driver P. Alagesan (37) and vehicle owner A. Balu (33) were arrested and remanded on Sunday.

Protesters held

Fourteen persons attached to the Samooga Matratirkana Manavar Kootamaipu were arrested on Monday for trying to picket the Collectorate, seeking release of the Students’ Union president of Jawaharlal Nehru University Kanhaiya Kumar.

The protesters were released later the day.
title: Two arrested for smuggling sand
